trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element that provides facilities for presenting content in an ordered or unordered list.
List enforces a strong content model for child content.
See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information about the List content model.
List is a flow content element designed to be formatted with markers such as bullets or numbering.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem> elements are the only permissible children for a List element.
Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection"></xref> containing the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> element.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection"></xref> containing the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
This property has no default value.
Gets or sets the desired distance between the contents of each <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"></xref> element, and the near edge of the list marker.
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than **0.0** but smaller than .
An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
*qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px Auto Causes the marker offset to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
Equivalent to a property value of <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
A double value specifying the desired distance between list content and the near edge of list markers, in device independent pixels.
A value of <xref:System.Double> (equivalent to an attribute value of "`Auto`") causes the marker offset to be determined automatically.
The default value is <xref:System.Double>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerOffset*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the marker style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.List"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|MarkerStyle| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle"></xref> enumeration specifying the marker style to use.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the starting index for labeling the items in an ordered list.
This property has no effect on unordered lists.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
The starting index for labeling items in an ordered list.
The default value is **1**.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.StartIndex*> dependency property.
To be added.
